item.title: Shader Breakdown - LCD Display
item.description: This post is the breakdown of LCD display shader. Source code for Unity URP is provided. Github Source Code So after reading this shader tutorial by Alan Zucconi, I decided to make my own version of LCD display shader. Without further ado, let’s get straight into it. This effect itself quiet simple, when viewing from distance, the LCD display act identical as a standard emissive material.
